name: Reboot Arena
description:
Reboot Arena is a team shooter (think Team Fortress or Overwatch) inspired RTS.

Select units by left-clicking or dragging, issue orders with right-click.  Move the camera by using the arrow keys, moving your cursor to the edge of the screen, or by clicking or dragging  the minimap.  Units may also be selected by clicking their portrait, or tapping the unit's number.  You can add or remove a single unit from an existing selection by holding down shift when you select it.

You control a team of robots which you will attempt to secure map objectives.   Your robots will respawn when they are destroyed.  Your robots can heal themselves by grabbing health pickups, and resupply their weapons with ammo pickups.

In this build:

One game-mode: King of the Hill: Take and hold the central control point for a total of three minutes before any opponent does the same.

Four Maps:

  • Knife-Fight (2 players): A tiny king of the hill map, you'll need to take and hold the central point with spawn points just around the corner.
  • Tempest (2 Players): A large king of the hill map with a twisty route to the center.
  • Olympus (8 players): A massive king of the hill map, where up to eight teams clash at the very center.  Expect complete mayhem.
  • Bracket (8 players): A large king of the hill map, where each team faces off individually before reaching the center.

One unit type:  The Trooper

  • Health: 500
  • Ammo: 200
  • Speed: Medium
  • Primary Weapon: Assault Rifle (Full-Auto)
    • 10 dmg 5/s
    • Inaccurate (10)
    • Medium-long range
    • Consumes 2 ammo per shot
    • Can't be fired while moving
  • Secondary Weapon: Assault Rifle (Semi-Auto)
    • 10 dmg 2/s
    • Accurate
    • Medium range
    • Consumes no ammo
    • Can be fired while moving
  • Special Ability: Frag Grenade
    • 50 dmg
    • Large blast radius
    • Arcing trajectory - can fire over units and walls
    • Consumes 100 ammo per activation
